name: Teq Network
description: TEQ Network revolutionizes decentralized hosting by offering Virtual Private Servers (VPS) and Graphics Processing Unit (GPU) servers through a user-friendly application. Our platform empowers businesses, developers, and individuals to rent tailored VPS solutions for their specific needs, ensuring flexibility, security, and control. With TEQ Network, users mitigate risks associated with centralized censorship and data breaches by distributing services across multiple nodes. This decentralized approach provides uninterrupted availability and enhanced security for digital assets. In addition to VPS hosting, TEQ Network provides GPU servers for resource-intensive applications like machine learning. Our platform also includes a Virtual Private Network (VPN) option for secure browsing. For more information dont hesitate to reach out project information link https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1-QgHzdTsZ4q1oWEeKEpDjmkG-AFgbpaV4xmO3bEhXzI/edit?usp=sharing
